about_the_game:
Cats Clicker: Super Puss Edition is a super DLC for the Cats Clicker game. Only for desperate puss lovers and hardcore players.

List of included features:

  • All income is multiplied by 5
  • Prestige points gain speed is multiplied by 5
  • Ranking score points are multiplied by 2
  • Possibility to disable progress reset when prestige is applied
  • Possibility to refund all spent prestige points (prestige upgrades will be reset)
  • Possibility to reduce all gallery prices for cats unlocking
  • Cool crowns and glasses for kittens

Each feature is optional and can be turned on and off at any moment. Have fun!
